_header: The commandments expounded here enden I you say
_description: Intro to Middle English prose text on the Ten Commandments — one couplet

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Þe comaundementz expouned here enden I ȝou seievnto þe
                    blis of heuene god vs wisse þe weie
CamMagPep2498.Note: As colophon to preceding prose work introduced by 4220.
